mapper.select: select * from qna order by qno
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qno, qid, qtitle, qcontent, qwritedate, qlastupdate, qpass) values (seq_qno.nextval, #{qid},#{qtitle},#{qcontent},#{qwritedate}, #{qlast_update}, #{qpass})
mapper.update: update qna set qtitle=#{qtitle}, qcontent=#{qcontent}, qpass=#{qpass} where qno=#{qno}
